definition: yin and yang
overcast (weather)/cloudy/shady/Yin (the negative principle of Yin and Yang)/negative (electric.)/feminine/moon/implicit/hidden/genitalia
surname Yin
positive (electric.)/sun/male principle (Taoism)/Yang, opposite: 陰|阴[yin1]
eccentric/peculiar/mystifying
School of Yin-Yang of the Warring States Period (475-221 BC) founded by Zou Yan 鄒衍|邹衍[Zou1 Yan3]
a deal where the parties collude to sign an under-the-table "yin contract" 陰合同|阴合同 as well as an ostensibly genuine "yang contract" 陽合同|阳合同 in order to deceive authorities

sentences.english: Doctors believe we need a balance of Ying and Yang to be healthy.
sentences.chinese: 年夜夫認爲我們的身體陰陽平衡才健康。

sentences.english: They are the yin and yang of 21st-century China.
sentences.chinese: 它們是21世紀中國的陰陽兩極。

sentences.english: Historiographers' expertise was the knowledge background of the Yin-Yang school.
sentences.chinese: 史官的王官之學是陰陽五行家的知識背景。

sentences.english: In French, words are either masculine or feminine, singular or plural.
sentences.chinese: 在法語中，詞語有陰陽性和單複數的變化。

sentences.english: Electrode selection for oxidation of cerium by cation ion-exchange membran electrolysis in sulfuric acid solution was reported in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 報導了硫酸介質中電解氧化鈰的陰陽極選擇。

sentences.english: He spoke enigmatically. Nobody knew what he had up his sleeve.
sentences.chinese: 他說得陰陽怪氣的，肚子裏不知畫的是啥道理。

sentences.english: After landing, "Yin and Yang face was sobbing hastily walked."
sentences.chinese: 落地之後，“陰陽臉”嗚咽地急急走了。

sentences.english: Yin - yang theory is in common use in Tibetan medical science.
sentences.chinese: 陰陽學說在藏醫中運用較爲普遍。

sentences.english: Across the Yin and Yang of the two circles, my preexistence.
sentences.chinese: 在陰陽界雙方，我的前世。

sentences.english: Finally, roc although abandon the gest of jade, but already with be apart of green yin and yang.
sentences.chinese: 最後，鵬雖廢玉之武功，但已與青陰陽相隔。

sentences.english: The geomantic omen doctrine was very current in North Song dynasty and had much influence on the mausoleum system then.
sentences.chinese: 宋代陰陽堪輿術影響甚盛，陵寢制度深受其影響。

sentences.english: They even confuse the nature of Yin and Yang of this kind of essence, taking Yin for Yang.
sentences.chinese: 甚至很容易混淆這種質性的陰陽本質，將陰辨識爲陽。

sentences.english: When Yin and Yang are unbalanced, dreams come into being.
sentences.chinese: 當陰陽失衡時，便會做夢。

sentences.english: The basic content of yin-yang theory can be summarized as follows.
sentences.chinese: 陰陽理論的基本內容可總結爲以下幾方面。

sentences.english: So you have a tradeoff almost it's almost like a Yin and a Yang.
sentences.chinese: 所以你必須做一個抉擇，就像陰陽之間的。

sentences.english: How to use the theory of yin-yang to analyze things happened around us?
sentences.chinese: 如何用陰陽學說來分析在我們周圍發生的事呢？

definition: all living things
overcast (weather)/cloudy/shady/Yin (the negative principle of Yin and Yang)/negative (electric.)/feminine/moon/implicit/hidden/genitalia
surname Yin
what is true and what is false/(to get to know) the real situation
at one go/at a stretch/for a period of time/forming a gang
The Yellow Emperor's Internal Canon, medical text c. 300 BC
channel of TCM
five viscera of TCM, namely: heart 心[xin1], liver 肝[gan1], spleen 脾[pi2], lungs 肺[fei4] and kidneys 腎|肾[shen4]
to turn upside down/to reverse/back to front/confused/deranged/crazy
heaven and earth/yin and yang
qi and blood (two basic bodily fluids of Chinese medicine)
to investigate/dialectical
(conjunction used to express contrast with a previous clause) but/then/standard/norm/principle/to imitate/to follow/classifier for written items
arteries and veins/vein (on a leaf, insect wing etc)
see 脈脈|脉脉[mo4 mo4]
inner organs
the four seasons, namely: spring 春, summer 夏, autumn 秋 and winter 冬
to correspond/a correspondence/corresponding/homologous/matching with sth/counterpart
